thread.title: British Airways Plane Catches Fire on Runway
thread.title_full: British Airways Plane Catches Fire on Runway

title: British Airways Plane Catches Fire on Runway
text:
British Airways Plane Catches Fire on Runway September 09, 2015 
Twenty people were injured on Tuesday afternoon after engine failure caused a raging fire on a British Airways Boeing 777 as it prepared for takeoff in Las Vegas. Passengers escaped from the blazing aircraft using inflatable slides, but 20 were injured and required treatment at Sunrise Hospital. The plane was about to embark on a 10-hour flight to London Gatwick. The National Transportation Safety Board said it will investigate the incident. 0
